properties.name: useFreqToCalcRateConstants
properties.description: Should frequencies be used to calculate rate constants?

properties.name: useFreqToCleanSurface
properties.description: Should frequencies be used for clean surface?

properties.name: useQuantum
properties.description: Quantum (true) or classical (false) vibrational partition functions for rate constant calcuations

properties.name: rateConstPrefactor
properties.description: Prefactor for rate constant calculations if frequencies are not used

properties.name: desorptionRatePrefactor
properties.description: Prefactor for desorption rate constant calculations (s-1) if frequencies are not used
